Posted By: TPmanW (12/13/2010 9:10:50 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Aside from hosing land destruction and combos when able to play multiple lands in a turn ([Fastbond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fastbond), [Oracle of Mul Daya](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oracle of Mul Daya), etc.), this is amazing with landfall and fetch lands. Would have been a power card in Standard if it had stayed in for M10 and still may be good in Extended.
  
   
This plus [Lotus Cobra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Cobra ) plus [Terramorphic Expanse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terramorphic Expanse) = 2 mana of any color and a new land (comes in tapped) every turn.
  
   
This plus a [Rampaging Baloth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rampaging Baloth) and [Terramorphic Expanse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terramorphic Expanse ) = 2 new 4/4's and a new land (tapped) every turn.
  
   
If you have the Baloth and the Cobra you get both. With fetch lands the new land comes in untapped at a cost of 1 life...maybe even better although it adds up if you're doing it every turn.
posts.html:
Aside from hosing land destruction and combos when able to play multiple lands in a turn (Fastbond, Oracle of Mul Daya, etc.), this is amazing with landfall and fetch lands. Would have been a power card in Standard if it had stayed in for M10 and still may be good in Extended.

This plus Lotus Cobra plus Terramorphic Expanse = 2 mana of any color and a new land (comes in tapped) every turn.

This plus a Rampaging Baloth and Terramorphic Expanse = 2 new 4/4's and a new land (tapped) every turn.

If you have the Baloth and the Cobra you get both. With fetch lands the new land comes in untapped at a cost of 1 life...maybe even better although it adds up if you're doing it every turn.

posts.post_content:
This + [Zuran Orb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zuran Orb) + [Fastbond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fastbond) + F\*\*k ban lists = infinite life-gain.  
  
Sacrifice a land to [Zuran Orb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zuran Orb): gain 2 life.  
  
Play the land thanks to Crucible. It will cost 1 life because of [Fastbond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fastbond).  
  
Repeat.  
  
Infinite tokens can happen if [Rampaging Baloths](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rampaging Baloths) are out. Infinite mana can happen if [Lotus Cobra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Cobra) is out. Quick milling can happen if [Hedron Crab](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hedron Crab) is out. The same can occur with [Scrib Nibblers](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scrib Nibblers). [Searing Blaze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Searing Blaze) can deal infinite damage to target player.   
  
Add anything with landfall to this combo, and you break the game.
posts.html:
This + Zuran Orb + Fastbond + F**k ban lists = infinite life-gain.

Sacrifice a land to Zuran Orb: gain 2 life.

Play the land thanks to Crucible. It will cost 1 life because of Fastbond.

Repeat.

Infinite tokens can happen if Rampaging Baloths are out. Infinite mana can happen if Lotus Cobra is out. Quick milling can happen if Hedron Crab is out. The same can occur with Scrib Nibblers. Searing Blaze can deal infinite damage to target player.

Add anything with landfall to this combo, and you break the game.
